text: @realDonaldTrump YOU are the virus that's killing this country. Do you think for one moment that the citizens of the U.S. want to hear your sarcasm. I'm sick and tired of your "BS". Instead of your "coronavirus press conferences" it should be "VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
